name: Bullets4Aliens
description:
The aliens attacked the earth.
They have sent transporter platforms from which they come from their world.
You are a special soldier and you must destroy the threat.
Overcome the 3 levels of the game by eliminating every alien and portal present.
To play use:


On web version play on full screen to use the bombs (ALT Button).

You have 3 different weapons to destroy them:


You can pickup some lives 

and bombs

To fire the bombs hold the button and release it when it has sufficient strength.

Design, graphics and development 
Mauro Rilla - https://misterm.itch.io

Music: 
Free assets from https://void1gaming.itch.io/
